Churchill, M.P., Prime Minister (in the Chair).C. R. Attlee, M.P.,State for dominion the Right Hon. Sir John Anderson,M;P., Lord President of the Council.The Right Hon. Ernest Bevin, M.P.,Minister of Labour and NationalService.The Right Hon. Herbert Morrison,M.P., Secretary of State for theHome Department and Minister ofHome Security.The following were alsp present:The Right Hon. Viscount Cranborne,Lord Privy Seal.The Right Hon. A. V.
